scripts.deploy:heroku: cd deploy && git add . && git commit -m "deploy app" && git push heroku master --force
scripts.build:react-client: rimraf ./deploy/client && cd react-client && yarn build && cpy "**/*.*" --cwd=build ../../deploy/client --parents
scripts.build:server: rimraf ./deploy/server && cd server && yarn build && cpy "**/*.*" --cwd=dist ../../deploy --parents
scripts.install:all: yarn install && cd server && yarn install && cd ../react-client && yarn install && cd ../deploy && yarn install
scripts.watch:all: concurrently "cd server && yarn watch:serve" "cd react-client && yarn start"
